title: Khemraj and Pasha are the winners of MTV Love School Season 2 : Reality TV, News - India Today
text:
Khemraj and Pasha are the winners of MTV Love School Season 2 Pasha hails from Russia and is a DJ in Delhi, while Khemraj works as a website designer. IANS | Posted by Anvita Singh A + A - Khemraj and Pasha. Picture courtesy: Instagram/roadies_rising 
Delhi-based couple Pasha Doll and Khemraj Bhardwaj on Saturday were announced as the winners of TV show MTV Love School Season 2. 
The show featured actors Karan Kundrra and Anusha Dandekar helping 10 couples to resolve their issues and rekindle their relationship. 
Khemraj and Pasha, who had multiple problems when they began their journey in the show, went on to progress in their relationship and came out as winners. 
While Pasha hails from Russia and is a DJ in Delhi, Khemraj works as a website designer. 
Also see: Karan Kundra and Anusha Dandekar are turning up the heat with this MTV Love School 2 photoshoot 
"It feels great to win MTV Love School Season 2. Khemraj and I started off with so many issues and now that all of them are resolved, I feel at peace," Pasha said in a statement. 
"The time we spent at Love School made me realise that Khemraj is the one for me," she added. 
Commenting on his victory, Khemraj said: "All I can say is that I am at a happy place right now. Pasha is the calm at the center of my storm. When we set out to be a part of MTV Love School Season 2, all we had in our mind was to work on our relationship. Coming from a different nationality, nobody had ever imagined that Pasha and I would win the show, but we did." For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
